org.pentaho.di.trans.steps.setvariable
Class SetVariableMeta

java.lang.Object
  org.pentaho.di.trans.step.BaseStepMeta
      org.pentaho.di.trans.steps.setvariable.SetVariableMeta
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, StepAttributesInterface, StepMetaInterface
public class SetVariableMeta
extends BaseStepMeta
implements StepMetaInterface

Sets environment variables based on content in certain fields of a single input row. Created on 27-apr-2006

getStepData

public StepDataInterface getStepData()
Description copied from interface: StepMetaInterface
Get a new instance of the appropriate data class. This data class implements the StepDataInterface. It basically contains the persisting data that needs to live on, even if a worker thread is terminated.

Specified by:
getStepData in interface StepMetaInterface
Returns:
The appropriate StepDataInterface class.
